TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_ACCEPT_PUBLISH: I hereby confirm and agree that my idea will be public once published. I confirm that I have the right to share the idea and the visual used in this proposal.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_DESCRIPTION_ANNOTA: This paragraph will appear on the main page and at the top of your contribution. Tell others about your idea and why you are proposing it. Describe what you will do, what you want to achieve and who will benefit and mention the duration of your project. (max. 1000 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_FINANCE_ANNOTATION: Only the “total budget” and “funding requested” will be public and shown on the proposal summary. Other data will be private and can only be seen by the “Advocate Europe” team and the jury. Once we have reviewed all submitted entries, we might come back to you and ask for a more detailed financial plan. You can see [[link:the template here]] and already use it while preparing your proposal.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_FINANCE_GRANTED_AN: If you are planning to include other sources of funding, are these already granted?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_HEARD_FROM_LABEL: How did you hear about “Advocate Europe”?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_IMAGE_ANNOTATION_1: Upload a photo, icon, or illustration that visually supports or explains your idea. Make sure that you have the property rights to share this picture publically.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_IMAGE_ANNOTATION_2: Image must be of type {{acceptedFileTypes | join}}, no bigger than {{maximumByteSize/1000000}}MB, and not less than {{minimumWidth}}px wide.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_LOCATION_ANNOTATIO: Where will your initiative, project or activity mainly take place?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_ORGANIZATION_STATU: I am part of a registered non-profit, e.g. NGO
A non-profit registration is planned or in process
I would like to try to realise the idea, but will need help with registering a non-profit organisation
How can we help you? Please specify
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_OTHER_SOURCES_ANNO: Do you foresee any other sources of funding for your activity or initiative? E.g. own contribution, other grants or financial aids.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_OUTCOME_ANNOTATION: If your proposal is selected, what will be different a year from now? What will have changed? What will a beneficiary of your idea tell you about it in a year from today? (max. 800 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_OUTCOME_LABEL: What would be a successful outcome of your project or initiative? What is the aim you want to reach?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_PARTNERS_ANNOTATIO: Please list the members of your team and briefly summarise their relevant experience and skills. If you will be working in partnership with another organisation, please describe their capacities as well. If you are working with others, how was the partnership established? Do you foresee the partnership of an established institution or player with an organisation or initiative that was recently founded or started? (max. 800 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_PARTNERS_LABEL: Please list your partner organisations and team members with their relevant experiences/skills.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_REQUESTED_FUNDING_: Funding requested from “Advocate Europe” can range between 1 and 50,000 EUR. Depending on your planning this amount can be the same as the “total budget” above.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_SHARE_EXPERIENCE_A: What kind of advice, comments, or lessons do you wish to receive from others on the platform regarding your idea or project proposal?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_STEPS_ANNOTATION: How and when will your realise your project or initiative? What steps will you take? Describe, as practically as possible, the approach and method you plan to use when implementing this activity or initiative. (max. 800 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_STEPS_LABEL: How do you want to get there?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_STORY_ANNOTATION: What is motivating you to act? Tell us about the ‘big dream’ behind your idea. Please also refer to your specific target group. (max. 800 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_STORY_LABEL: What is the story behind your idea?
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_TEASER_ANNOTATION: You have one sentence to make others curious about your idea. How would you describe it? What is your teaser? (max. 300 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_TITLE_ANNOTATION: Give your idea a meaningful title (max. 100 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_TOTAL_BUDGET_ANNOT: Indicate an estimation of your overall budget. The total budget can (but does not have to) include the applicant’s own contribution or external sources of funding.
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_USER_INFO_ANNOTATI: This will be shown as your personal profile Your email address will not be published
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_VALUE_ANNOTATION: What value does your idea add to Europe? What makes it different from others? Could you imagine transferring this idea to other countries, sectors or organisations? (max. 800 characters)
TR__MERCATOR_PROPOSAL_VALUE_LABEL: Why does Europe need your idea?
